subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paula Creamer shot a four-under-par 68 yesterday to increase her lead to six strokes in the Tournament of Champions in Mobile, Ala. The event is limited to active Hall of Famers and players who have won tournaments since 2004.
snippet: Paula Creamer shot a four-under-par 68 yesterday to increase her lead to six strokes in the Tournament of Champions in Mobile, Ala. The event is limited to active Hall of Famers and players who have won tournaments since 2004.
